title: [Self-Directed] Analysis of Educational Technology and Instructional Design Using Text Mining

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistics, understanding of educational technology concepts, and academic paper comprehension skills
context.additional_context: Data collection and analysis activities enabled via smartphones in resource-limited technological settings.

learning_goals: Learners can classify research trends in educational technology into three or more keyword clusters via text mining.
Learners can summarize core themes of academic papers in three sentences or fewer by analyzing instructional design principles and technology integration cases.
Learners can derive five major issues in educational technology based on text mining results and suggest practical implications.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
